title: >>> DODGEBALL X Final Preview
body_text:
Tonight is the night all have been looking forward too. For weeks, you've heard of this extraordinary event and tonight, DODGEBALL X finally takes place. It is a milestone event to say the least.
The first ever Friday dodgeball event will include the introduction of the Hall of Fame, thus furthering the importance of X. Six incredible athletes will be awarded dodgeball's top prize with their induction into the elite group. Add in the "Dodgeball Excellence" awards, and the night will be complete even before the action starts.
As for the competition, like every week, it will be top of the line. You will not find better athletes than the ones you see playing every week over at Ocean Road Park. From Hall of Famers to standout rookies, you are guaranteed to find a top notch opponent by one nights end. Great catchers, powerhouse throwers, extreme dodgers, the list goes on and on. This sport has generated the finest of athletes and will continue to do so week in and week out.
Time is ticking towards the biggest dodgeball event in history.
Are you ready?

The first ever Friday dodgeball event will include the introduction of the Hall of Fame, thus furthering the importance of X. Six incredible athletes will be awarded dodgeball's top prize with their induction into the elite group. Add in the "Dodgeball Excellence" awards, and the night will be complete even before the action starts.

As for the competition, like every week, it will be top of the line. You will not find better athletes than the ones you see playing every week over at Ocean Road Park. From Hall of Famers to standout rookies, you are guaranteed to find a top notch opponent by one nights end. Great catchers, powerhouse throwers, extreme dodgers, the list goes on and on. This sport has generated the finest of athletes and will continue to do so week in and week out.

Are you ready?
